findings.message:
BvaultsBank.pendingReward(uint256,uint256,address) (../..0x31b38ba067c8b9c63eca3fe14d724ffe10b6a2b2.sol#921-937) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-_reward = _multiplier.mul(_rewardPerBlock).mul(pool.allocPoint).div(totalAllocPoint) (../..0x31b38ba067c8b9c63eca3fe14d724ffe10b6a2b2.sol#933)
	-_accRewardPerShare = _accRewardPerShare.add(_reward.mul(1e18).div(sharesTotal)) (../..0x31b38ba067c8b9c63eca3fe14d724ffe10b6a2b2.sol#934)
findings.name: divide-before-multiply

findings.message:
BvaultsBank.updatePool(uint256) (../..0x31b38ba067c8b9c63eca3fe14d724ffe10b6a2b2.sol#961-982) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-_reward = multiplier.mul(_rewardPerBlock).mul(pool.allocPoint).div(totalAllocPoint) (../..0x31b38ba067c8b9c63eca3fe14d724ffe10b6a2b2.sol#978)
	-pool.accRewardPerShare[_rewardPid] = pool.accRewardPerShare[_rewardPid].add(_reward.mul(1e18).div(sharesTotal)) (../..0x31b38ba067c8b9c63eca3fe14d724ffe10b6a2b2.sol#979)
findings.name: divide-before-multiply

findings.message:
BvaultsBank.resetStrategy(uint256,address) (../..0x31b38ba067c8b9c63eca3fe14d724ffe10b6a2b2.sol#862-866) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(IERC20(pool.want).balanceOf(poolInfo[_pid].strategy) == 0 || pool.accRewardPerShare[_pid] == 0,strategy not empty) (../..0x31b38ba067c8b9c63eca3fe14d724ffe10b6a2b2.sol#864)
findings.name: incorrect-equality

findings.message:
Reentrancy in BvaultsBank.migrateStrategy(uint256,address) (../..0x31b38ba067c8b9c63eca3fe14d724ffe10b6a2b2.sol#868-878):
	External calls:
	- IStrategy(_oldStrategy).withdraw(address(this),_oldWantAmt) (../..0x31b38ba067c8b9c63eca3fe14d724ffe10b6a2b2.sol#874)
	- pool.want.transfer(_newStrategy,_oldWantAmt) (../..0x31b38ba067c8b9c63eca3fe14d724ffe10b6a2b2.sol#875)
	- IStrategy(_newStrategy).migrateFrom(_oldStrategy,_oldWantAmt,_oldSharesTotal) (../..0x31b38ba067c8b9c63eca3fe14d724ffe10b6a2b2.sol#876)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pool.strategy = _newStrategy (../..0x31b38ba067c8b9c63eca3fe14d724ffe10b6a2b2.sol#877)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:

	External calls:

	- pool.want.safeTransfer(address(msg.sender),amount) (../..0x31b38ba067c8b9c63eca3fe14d724ffe10b6a2b2.sol#1093)

	- user.rewardDebt[_rewardPid] = 0 (../..0x31b38ba067c8b9c63eca3fe14d724ffe10b6a2b2.sol#1098)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
